name: Carl TÃ¶rnqvist
body:
I am a design technologist and front end engineer based in Stockholm, Sweden.

I have been making high quality stuff for the web for over half a decade. During my adventures across the web I have come to find myself comfortable with [component oriented CSS](http://suitcss.github.io), large scale JavaScript applications using frameworks like [Backbone](http://backbonejs.org) and [ReactJS](https://facebook.github.io/react) and accessible HTML markup.

## Selected work
- [Coop.se](http://coop.se): **Front end architecture.** The digital storefront of one of Sweden's largest chain of supermarkets. Including their online shopping experience.
- [Marginalen.se](https://www.marginalen.se): **Front end architecture.** An all-digital Swedish bank with a breadth of services.

## Ways to reach me
- [calle.tornqvist@gmail.com](mailto:calle.tornqvist@gmail.com)
- [twitter.com/carltornqvist](https://twitter.com/carltornqvist)
- [github.com/tornqvist](https://github.com/tornqvist)
